results.description: SUGGESTION1: pharmaceuticals_exposure_score has zero userCount so I avoid it; instead choose related exposure with data. SUGGESTION2/3 N/A. KEEP_IN_MIND: single field selection from available list. Confidence 0.45 — limited data makes confidence low.

results.idea: Short-interest inertia: ts_zscore of change to detect trend
results.description: SUGGESTION1: ts_zscore(ts_delta(short_interest_factor_score,14),14) used. SUGGESTION4 used. KEEP_IN_MIND: single field and two operators. Confidence 0.61 — detects strengthening/weakening short pressure.

results.idea: Momentum when hedge-fund ownership rising (institutional confirmation)
results.description: SUGGESTION1: multiply ts_zscore(rsk70_mfm2_usfast_momentum,30) with ts_delta(hedge_fund_ownership_percent,30) to find momentum with institutional inflows. SUGGESTION4 used. KEEP_IN_MIND: two fields. Confidence 0.68 — institutional confirmation strengthens signals.

results.idea: High sentiment but low hedge-fund ownership (early breakout)
results.description: SUGGESTION1: multiply rsk70_mfm2_usfast_sentmt with reverse hedge_fund_ownership_percent to detect underowned sentiment. SUGGESTION4 used. KEEP_IN_MIND: two fields. Confidence 0.64 — early breakout detection is valuable though riskier.

results.idea: Momentum conditioned on low specific risk variance for semiconductors
results.description: SUGGESTION1: semiconductors_exposure_score with specific_risk_variance scaling. SUGGESTION4 applied. KEEP_IN_MIND: two fields. Confidence 0.60 — sector-specific picks need risk scaling.

results.idea: Hedge-fund ownership percent mean-reversion combined with market factor
results.description: SUGGESTION1: compare hedge_fund_ownership_percent with rsk70_mfm2_usfast_market to detect excessive crowding vs market. SUGGESTION4 applied. KEEP_IN_MIND: two fields. Confidence 0.63 — relative crowding vs market useful for timing reversals.

results.idea: Short-term momentum filtered by specific risk (fast filter)
results.description: SUGGESTION1: ts_zscore(daily_specific_return,5) divided by (1+specific_risk_uncertainty) to avoid noisy names. SUGGESTION4 used. KEEP_IN_MIND: two fields. Confidence 0.66 — practical filter for intraday/daily strategies.

results.idea: Momentum confirmation via prospect and regmom (regional confirmation)
results.description: SUGGESTION1: multiply momentum with regmom factor to get regionally-confirmed momentum. SUGGESTION4 used. KEEP_IN_MIND: two fields. Confidence 0.70 — regional confirmation raises probability of continuation.

results.idea: Mean-reversion on daily specific return with market-neutralization by beta
results.description: SUGGESTION1: daily_specific_return divided by rsk70_mfm2_usfast_beta to reduce market exposure. SUGGESTION4 used. KEEP_IN_MIND: two fields. Confidence 0.67 — market neutralization improves idiosyncratic capture.

results.idea: Short-interest mean-reversion preceded by sentiment decline
results.description: SUGGESTION1: subtract sentiment zscore from short interest to find fading shorts. SUGGESTION4 used. KEEP_IN_MIND: two fields. Confidence 0.62 — fading negative sentiment can relieve short pressure.

results.idea: Momentum scaled by size and residual volatility (two-field limit: size)
results.description: SUGGESTION1: use momentum scaled by size (current_market_cap_usd) due to two-field constraint; residual vol not included. SUGGESTION4 used. KEEP_IN_MIND: two fields. Confidence 0.65 — size-scaling improves implementation.

results.idea: Prospect monthly surprise paired with low specific risk variance
results.description: SUGGESTION1: multiply prospect_specret_monthly by reverse specific_risk_variance to prefer clean prospects. SUGGESTION4 used. KEEP_IN_MIND: two fields. Confidence 0.66 — reduces false positives.

results.idea: Earnings yield improvement with low hedge-fund ownership
results.description: SUGGESTION1: ts_delta(rsk70_mfm2_usfast_earnyild,60) times reverse hedge fund ownership to find underowned improving yielders. SUGGESTION4 applied. KEEP_IN_MIND: two fields. Confidence 0.61 — promising but moderate conviction.

results.idea: Industry momentum contrast: restaurant vs food retail
results.description: SUGGESTION1: restaurant_industry_exposure_score minus food_retail_exposure_score. SUGGESTION4 considered. KEEP_IN_MIND: two fields. Confidence 0.52 — small industry spreads can be useful but require volume.

results.idea: Momentum conditional on low specific risk uncertainty in biotech
results.description: SUGGESTION1: use biotechnology_life_sciences_exposure_score with scaling by specific_risk_uncertainty. SUGGESTION4 moderate. KEEP_IN_MIND: two fields. Confidence 0.58 — biotech is volatile so risk scaling helps.

results.idea: Momentum versus earnings quality spread
results.description: SUGGESTION1: subtract earnings quality zscore from momentum zscore to find momentum not supported by quality (higher risk). SUGGESTION4 used. KEEP_IN_MIND: two fields. Confidence 0.55 — helps avoid low-quality momentum traps.

results.idea: Short-interest momentum filter for semiconductor equipment
results.description: SUGGESTION1: semiconductors_exposure_score penalized by short_interest_factor_score to avoid crowded equipment names. SUGGESTION4 used. KEEP_IN_MIND: two fields. Confidence 0.59 — reduces squeeze/execution risk.

results.idea: Hedge-fund ownership percent momentum (institutional trend)
results.description: SUGGESTION1: ts_delta(hedge_fund_ownership_percent,30) picks names with increasing institutional interest. SUGGESTION4 applied. KEEP_IN_MIND: one field. Confidence 0.64 — institutional accumulation often precedes returns.

results.idea: Short-interest spike reversal in small caps
results.description: SUGGESTION1: detect short_interest spikes and combine with small size via current_market_cap_usd but limited to two fields; use short-interest spike and size reverse. SUGGESTION4 used. KEEP_IN_MIND: two fields. Confidence 0.63 — successful when execution feasible.

results.idea: Momentum enhanced by decreasing specific risk (improving fundamentals)
results.description: SUGGESTION1: multiply momentum by reverse specific_risk_variance to favor momentum with improving idiosyncratic risk. SUGGESTION4 used. KEEP_IN_MIND: two fields. Confidence 0.68 — captures improving-risk winners.

results.idea: Earnings-quality momentum fracture detector (avoid momentum with falling quality)
results.description: SUGGESTION1: subtract ts_delta(earnqlty,90) from momentum to penalize falling quality. SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 used. KEEP_IN_MIND: two fields. Confidence 0.62 — avoids quality deterioration traps.

results.idea: Prospect surprise weighted by low hedge fund count (less crowded discoveries)
results.description: SUGGESTION1: prospect_specret_daily multiplied by reverse hedge_fund_ownership_count to find undercovered positive surprises. SUGGESTION4 used. KEEP_IN_MIND: two fields. Confidence 0.66 — uncrowded discoveries yield alpha.

results.idea: Momentum with dividend yield hedge (reduce drawdown in yielders)
results.description: SUGGESTION1: combine momentum with dividend yield as a hedge but KEEP_IN_MIND two-field limit: divide momentum by (1 + divyild). SUGGESTION4 used. Confidence 0.61 — income cushion reduces volatility.
